Shorts Bio

I am a Ph.D student in Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering at SNU. My advisor is Prof. Byoungyoung Lee (@lifeasageek) & Research Interest is Software Security.

Education

Seoul National University, Seoul, South Korea (Sep 2019 ~ Current)

Hanyang University, Seoul, South Korea (Mar 2012 ~ Feb 2018)

  • B.S. Computer Science Engineering
